id - Variable in class com.vtuberrush.src.enemies.Enemy
A unique identifier for this unit, used as a unique identifier for the enemies [Enemy] array list.

initNextWave() - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.managers.WaveManager
Increments the wave index by one, resets the wave delay timer, and defines the next enemy to be spawned as the enemy in the first index of the next wave.
